mapper.select: select f.f_title, f.f_rate, f.f_bname, f.f_enddate i.i_num as i_num, i.i_name as filename, i.i_uuid as uuid from f_like l left outer join funding f on l.funding_f_num = f.f_num left outer join image i on f.f_num = i.funding_f_num where member_m_num = #{m_num} and i.i_type = 1 order by l.l_num desc
